# delegate

**Instance Property**

The image’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSImageDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property contains `nil`.

## Managing Loading and Drawing of Images

- **NSImageDelegate**: A set of optional methods that you can use to respond to drawing failures and manage incremental loads.

items.description: A set of optional methods that you can use to respond to drawing failures and manage incremental loads.
